ctu_text: \n 1. Applications must be submitted within two years from the date of the worker&#39;s death. \n 1. Financial assistance is provided under this scheme for the death of a worker primarily caused by workplace incidents within the organization&#39;s premises or on the way to the hospital for treatment.
